content.html:
I’m a Toronto-based Product Designer. I am passionate about creating well-designed, easy to use and accessible experiences for users. I love working closely with customers, product managers, engineers, end users and other team members to help create great products.

I currently work at BiblioCommons, a company that creates digital products for public libraries. At BiblioCommons, I spend most of my time researching, designing and performing usability testing for a variety of different product features for both library patrons and staff.

And what do I do in my free time? I love to travel but I also love to spend time at home. You can find me cooking, baking, reading and playing videos games. I also try to watch and play as much basketball as I can!

Thanks for taking the time to look at my website. If you want to learn more about what I do, or connect with me,  please feel free to email me or contact me on LinkedIn.
